creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Purchase Fund
description: Installation of photographs with text (text selected from the three groups of material docmented in this Object record), applied to specified locations on the wall surrounding/above/below the images. Five photographs accompany the text, but not all need to be displayed at one time.
medium: Installation of photographs with accompanying text
portfolio: From In the Place of the Public: Airport Series
title: In the Place of the Public: Airport Series
